translator_notes: 抗琴居 (Kangqinju) is the name of an online Dream of the Red Chamber literary community and forum that preserves and shares scholarly editions of the novel
This edition represents collaborative digital humanities work preserving early manuscript commentary
research_notes: Verified that Kangqinju is a well-known online community for 红楼梦 scholars and enthusiasts
